comments.body: Watch out for this stuff when merging master after writing a changelog entry.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +32,36 @@- [DAML Triggers] ``getTemplates`` has been renamed to ``getContracts`` to describe its behavior more accurately.
  ``getTemplates`` still exists as a compatiblity helper but it is deprecated and will be removed in a future SDK release.
- [JSON API - Experimental] Fix to support Archive choice. See issue #3219.
- [JSON API - Experimental] Implement replay on database consistency violation, See issue #3387.

comments.body: Is this a merge artifact?
I think this just shows up because I added a trailing newline.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +15,19 @@   * Allow a ledger api server to share the DAML engine with the DAML-on-X participant node for performance. See `issue #2975 <https://github.com/digital-asset/daml/issues/2975>`__.
   * Allow non-alphanumeric characters in ledger api server participant ids (space, colon, hash, slash, dot).
   * Include SQL statement type in ledger api server logging of SQL errors.
- [DAML Compiler] Support for incremental builds in ``daml build`` using the ``--incremental=yes`` flag.
  This is still experimental and disabled by default but will become enabled by default in the future.

@@ -1,1 +27,31 @@+ [DAML-SDK Docker Image] The image now contains a ``daml`` user and the SDK is installed to ``/home/daml/.daml``.
  ``/home/daml/.daml/bin`` is automatically added to ``PATH``.

  See `issue #2906 <https://github.com/digital-asset/daml/issues/2906>`_.

comments.body: Why is this not breaking? Because we never documented the `newtype` in the surface language?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +34,38 @@+ [DAML Ledger Integration Kit] The TTL for commands is now read from the configuration service.
+ [DAML Ledger Integration Kit] The contract key tests now live under a single test suite and are multi-node aware.
- [DAML Compiler] Generic template instantiations like ``template instance IouProposal = Proposal Iou`` now generate a type synonym ``type IouProposal = Proposal Iou`` that can be used in DAML. Before, they generated a ``newtype``, which cannot be used anymore.

@@ -1,1 +13,17 @@  The endpoint returns ``ActiveContract`` objects without ``GetActiveContractsResponse`` wrappers.
  See `issue #2987 <https://github.com/digital-asset/daml/pull/2987>`_.
- [DAML Assistant] ``daml start`` now supports ``--sandbox-option=opt``, ``--navigator-option=opt``
  and ``--json-api-option=opt`` to pass additional option to sandbox/navigator/json-api.
  These flags can be specified multiple times.

comments.body:
I'm not sure we should track changes like this in the _user facing_ changelog. The numeric type is still very much under development and adding changelog entries for this adds a lot of noise and might give others the impression we're doing tons of breaking changes.
What do you think @gerolf-da?
@hurryabit: sounds reasonable. Maybe for daml-lf 1.dev it makes sense to keep an internal changelog? this way we keep track of all the changes without adding it to the SDK changelog.

@hurryabit You'r right. 
@georg-da We have already a change log for dev in the DAML-LF specification. It should be enough to track changes here.
I propose that we promote the changes to DAML-LF 1.dev from the DAML-LF spec changelog to the proper changelog when we freeze a version of DAML-LF.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +13,17 @@+ [DAML-LF] add CAST_NUMERIC and SHIFT_NUMERIC in DAML-LF 1.dev
+ [Sandbox] Dramatically increased performance of the ActiveContractService by only loading the contracts that the parties in the transaction filter are allowed to see.
+ [DAML-LF] change signature of MUL_NUMERIC and DIV_NUMERIC

comments.body:
I thought the classes were just called differently? Are they not exposed or why canâ€™t you create instances yourself?

This would mean a giant refactoring of a codebase (you can probably guess which one :)).

You can't create the instances now because the compiler inserts parts of the implementation based on methods in the `XInstance` (where X is a template name) typeclass.

I'll have a look at the damage to that codebase.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +23,27 @@- [Sandbox] The active contract service correctly serves stakeholders. See `#2070 <https://github.com/digital-asset/daml/issues/2070>`__.
- [Sandbox] Added the ``--maxInboundMessageSize`` CLI parameter to set the maximux size of messages received through the Ledger API. If the value is not set the current default is preserved (4 MB).
- [DAML Compiler] Handwritten instances of ``Template`` and ``Choice`` typeclasses are no longer supported.
  All template constructs must be defined using declarations inside ``template`` syntax.
